summary.title: Bank Management System - Java
summary.description:
A Java console-based banking application supporting admin and manager roles. 
Admins can create/edit accounts, deposit/withdraw/transfer funds, and calculate interest. 
Managers can manage admins, unlock accounts, and change system passwords. 
The system stores account and user data in-memory with login authentication and account locking. 
Data resets on program close (max 5 accounts/admins). Future plans include database integration and GUI.
